Title: The Favor
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Aeysha Carr, Carly Hallam (executive story editor), Jessica Polonsky (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Holt owes Seamus Murphy a favor, so the precinct searches for a loophole that will allow the captain to keep his end of the bargain without breaking the law.
